attributes.name: Placement
attributes.description: Specifies how the element is placed relative to surrounding content (e.g., block-level or inline flow).

attributes.name: WritingMode
attributes.description: Defines the direction of text flow (e.g., left-to-right, right-to-left, or vertical).

attributes.name: BackgroundColor
attributes.description: Sets the background color for the element’s content area.

attributes.name: BorderColor
attributes.description: Specifies the color of the border around the element.

attributes.name: BorderStyle
attributes.description: Indicates the style of the border (e.g., solid, dashed, dotted).

attributes.name: BorderThickness
attributes.description: Defines the thickness of the border line in user space units (such as points).

attributes.name: Color
attributes.description: Applies the primary color (fill or stroke) for the text or graphic content.

attributes.name: Padding
attributes.description: Determines the space between the element’s border (or boundary) and its inner content.

attributes.name: SpaceBefore
attributes.description: Specifies the additional spacing before the element.

attributes.name: SpaceAfter
attributes.description: Specifies the additional spacing after the element.

attributes.name: StartIndent
attributes.description: Defines the indentation at the start edge (left edge in LTR) of the element.

attributes.name: EndIndent
attributes.description: Defines the indentation at the end edge (right edge in LTR) of the element.

attributes.name: TextIndent
attributes.description: Specifies the indentation of the first line of text in a paragraph.

attributes.name: TextAlign
attributes.description: Controls how text is aligned within the element (left, right, center, justify).

attributes.name: BBox
attributes.description: Indicates the bounding box of the element, specifying its position and size on the page.

attributes.name: Width
attributes.description: Declares an explicit width for the element in user space units.

attributes.name: Height
attributes.description: Declares an explicit height for the element in user space units.

attributes.name: BlockAlign
attributes.description: Specifies vertical alignment of a block-level element (e.g., top, middle, bottom) within its container.

attributes.name: InlineAlign
attributes.description: Specifies how inline content is aligned within the line box (e.g., baseline, center).

attributes.name: TBorderStyle
attributes.description: Indicates the border style for table cells or similar tabular structures.

attributes.name: TPadding
attributes.description: Specifies the padding inside table cells or table-like elements.

attributes.name: LineHeight
attributes.description: Controls the spacing between lines of text (line spacing).

attributes.name: BaselineShift
attributes.description: Shifts the text baseline up or down (used for subscripts, superscripts, etc.).

attributes.name: TextDecorationColor
attributes.description: Specifies the color used for text decorations (like underline or strike-through).

attributes.name: TextDecorationThickness
attributes.description: Defines the thickness of any text decoration line.

attributes.name: TextDecorationType
attributes.description: Indicates the type of text decoration (underline, overline, line-through).

attributes.name: RubyAlign
attributes.description: Controls how ruby text (primarily in East Asian typography) is aligned relative to its base text.

attributes.name: RubyPosition
attributes.description: Specifies the placement of ruby text (above or below the base text).

attributes.name: GlyphOrientationVertical
attributes.description: Determines the orientation of glyphs when text is written in a vertical writing mode.

attributes.name: ColumnCount
attributes.description: Specifies the number of columns for multi-column layouts.

attributes.name: ColumnGap
attributes.description: Indicates the spacing (gap) between columns in multi-column layouts.

attributes.name: ColumnWidths
attributes.description: Specifies the width of each column in multi-column layouts.

attributes.name: ListNumbering
attributes.description: Controls the numbering style used in lists (e.g., decimal, Roman, bullet).

attributes.name: Role
attributes.description: Assigns a semantic role to the element for accessibility or structure mapping.

attributes.name: Checked, checked
attributes.description: Indicates whether a form field (like a checkbox) is in a checked state.

attributes.name: Desc
attributes.description: Provides a descriptive text for the element, often used for accessibility or annotations.

pdfTags.description: Represents visual content like images, graphs, or charts in a PDF document.

differences.wellTaggedPDF: Includes alt text and optionally captions, but may not meet all assistive technology needs.
differences.pdfUA: Strict adherence to accessibility, including unique alt text and proper role mapping.

roles.misusePrevention: Do not use for decorative elements; mark those as artifacts.

validationTips: Ensure every figure has meaningful alt text.
Verify figures are not incorrectly tagged as text.

Tables.description: Figures can be used inside tables to visually represent data.

Lists.description: Figures can be part of a list, where each list item describes an image.
